meanings.definition: To stare openly in a stupid or rude manner.
meanings.sent1: The child gawped at the colorful balloons in amazement.
meanings.sent2: She gawped at the strange creature in disbelief.
meanings.sent3: Everyone gawped when the clown slipped on a banana peel.
meanings.sent4: The audience gawped as the magician made the elephant disappear.
meanings.sent5: He gawped at the breathtaking view from the mountaintop.

meanings.definition: A person who stares openly in a stupid or rude manner.
meanings.sent1: The gawped made everyone uncomfortable with his intense staring.
meanings.sent2: She avoided the gawped on the bus who wouldn't stop staring at her.
meanings.sent3: The gawped at the party was the center of attention for all the wrong reasons.
meanings.sent4: The gawped in the movie theater ruined the film for everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: Being labeled as the class gawped made him self-conscious about his staring habits.
